title: The Rabbit and the Dragon King

sentences.english: The Dragon King was sick and needed a rabbit's liver for medicine.
sentences.korean: 용왕은 병이 났고 약으로 토끼의 간이 필요했습니다.

sentences.english: A turtle went to land to trick a rabbit into coming underwater.
sentences.korean: 자라가 육지로 가서 토끼를 속여 물속으로 데려왔습니다.

sentences.english: The rabbit realized the danger and came up with a clever plan.
sentences.korean: 토끼는 위험을 깨닫고 기발한 계획을 생각해 냈습니다.

sentences.english: He lied that he left his liver back on land to keep it safe.
sentences.korean: 그는 간을 안전하게 보관하기 위해 육지에 두고 왔다고 거짓말을 했습니다.

sentences.english: The King let him go back to the forest to get it.
sentences.korean: 왕은 간을 가져오라고 그를 숲으로 돌려보냈습니다.

sentences.english: The rabbit ran away and the turtle returned empty-handed.
